headline.main: Obama's New Chef Skewers School Lunches

docs.abstract: White House chef Sam Kass from Chicago has been talking about changing the way American children eat.
docs.lead_paragraph: Before he agreed to cook for the Obama family in the White House, Chicago chef Sam Kass was already talking about changing the way American children eat.
docs.snippet: White House chef Sam Kass from Chicago has been talking about changing the way American children eat.

headline.print_headline: Newest White House Chef Knows the Obamas’ Tastes
headline.main: Newest White House Chef Knows the Obamas’ Tastes

docs.lead_paragraph: Sam Kass, who cooked for the Obamas in Chicago, is one of the new breed of chefs who are concerned about the environment and about poor eating habits in America.
docs.snippet: Sam Kass, who cooked for the Obamas in Chicago, is one of the new breed of chefs who are concerned about the environment and about poor eating habits in America.
